text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN

was built for moments like this.

When facts are questioned,

When trust falters,

When division deepens,

When the role of higher education is on trial,

/ Look to the Voices strengthening democracy through dialogue.

/ Look to the Leaders expanding the boundaries of knowledge.

/ Look to the Experts turning climate risk into climate resilience.

/ Look to the Practitioners delivering healthcare grounded in science and dignity.

/ Look to the Innovators advancing technology with a public purpose.

/ Look to the University committed to strengthening the work that strengthens society.

To meet this moment, the University of Michigan is investing $1 billion over the next decade to fuel ideas, drive progress, and cultivate partnerships—a historic commitment ensuring students, faculty, researchers, and alumni continue transforming public investment into public good.

Because wherever we go, progress follows. Wherever there's a Wolverine, there's a way forward.

For answers. For action. For all of us.

/ Look to Michigan

MM UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN

Look to umich.edu/look M ichigan
